title: Banned for Using Third Party Software
body: I have noticed a lot of other people have been getting this, as well as a couple of my own friends. I received a perma ban for apparently exploiting the game, although all I have ever used is Curse Voice with the people that I play with. Is this the result of some new ban detection system that Riot is trying out or are they just trolling.... Like 3 of my friends got their accs banned today for "scripting, 3rd party software or exploits", most of them are like bronze 5 and their match history would not entertain the idea of scripting. I fear that if I submit a ticket I'm going to get a generic automated response, as well as the fact that Riot probably won't disclose the "evidence" of me cheating because it's against their security policy or something... help a fellow nerd out :)

replies.body:
Hey OP --

I took a look at your account and the detection in this case was for actions that happened when your account was compromised awhile back. >_< I've gone ahead and removed the suspension from the account as you've already been through account recovery. 

**Tips for Account Security**: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664

Can you please take a look at mines? Riot support team is just copying and pasting the terms as a response. I worked so hard to get to where I am. I never used any programs except for Skype, Teamspeak, Curse, Pandora, Youtube, etc. Thank you so much

Do you know if there are any plans to eventually account for this sort of thing? It appears that you likely have some sort of timestamp window for when a violation took place and you also know the window in which the account was compromised. 

I don't know how the system works. I dont know if an actual person reviews every potential violation and this specific case was made by human error or if there is an automatic system which puts violators in some sort of punish pit. Either way it might be beneficial to help negate these false positives if the system also was able to exclude certain things. 

In this Case @Cluvie you went above and beyond to personally assist, but I would know I would feel terrible if I knew there were people out there who were punished but should not have been.
Going to look into it. The system itself is pretty automated. It's clear that this is a problem though and something we should try and account for somehow, someway if we can.
This problem should never have gotten this bad. Hell everyday I log in afraid to death that I'll get a false ban.
Or, and I know this is a crazy idea, the situation isn't that bad, and some of the people declaring their own innocence aren't telling the truth.

Of course some are lying but there are most likely untold more who haven't bothered to comment. The thing is automated banning is never a good idea cause it will make mistakes and the customer gets screwed

I have a feeling that the "untold more" innocents number in the 10's.  While the lying guilty parties number in the 10's of thousands.  Gotta break a few eggs.  If only capital punishment were a viable punishment for cheating.

Manual reviews will also lead to mistakes though. To err is human and what not. One could argue that an automated system is also going to be more objective and make less mistakes. It looks for certain variables, and simply detects whether or not they are present in the data without bias or emotion. Not only that, an automated system is required, because there is just no way you could have people looking through every single game or case in a timely manner.

Dear Riot Support Team,
It is an honored to be accused of using "programs" for having great mechanics (side stepping), amazing communication, and awesome shotcalling. I'm not asking you to forgive me and give me a second chance. I'm telling you that you are making a mistake for something that I did not do. You guys won't show me any evidence and only respond to my ticket and everyone's else with a "scripted" letter stating the terms and service of the game. The only way I can show you that I don't use "programs" to get an advantage over other players is by degrading myself and proving to you that I suck. That all these years of grinding for hours and getting to where I am, Plat II, was by programs? I have 185 wins and 168 losses. My most played champs is Leona with a 61.8% win rate and 1.4/5.3/13.2 KDA, while my thresh is currently at a 43.5% win rate, therefore if I were using "programs" I would be landing all my hooks and be winning games. I don't know if there were players that reported me for "cheating" or what? I rarely play normal and aram but when I do, I go like 20/5 because the system matches me with bronzes and silvers. I don't know if they reported me for my map awareness and mechanics. Please look into this. "Its better that 10 guilty men go free than one innocent man is wrongfully convicted." I truly stand by this quote and its meaning, because I am that one man and many others who are in this same situation right now. I truly believe that anyone who is abusing the system should be permanent banned, but I cannot sleep into I know that I am cleared for something I did not do and will not do. Thank you for your time. Please reconsider and look into my account again. I believe that those who do the right thing will be rewarded.
